ModMetaData.name: [JDS] The Forge - Anvil
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
The Forge is just a core mod for all my armor mods what i made so far, by it self does nothing but add any of my stantalone armor let you Research and craft said armor.
[h1]Features:[/h1] -2 New workbenchs - Research/Research tree
[h1]recommend Mod"[h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1678847247] Graphics Settings - Fix your textures! [/url]
